description: Runs logic operation.
When the result is `null` the next reducer will not be called.

reducers.name: gt
description: See pipe [gt()](../pipe#gt)
Consider that **out.gt()** is the same as **pipe.gt(-)**

reducers.name: gte
description: See pipe [gte()](../pipe#gte)
Consider that **out.gte()** is the same as **pipe.gte(-)**

Consider that **out.lte()** is the same as **pipe.lte(-)**

reducers.name: equals
